item.title: Website Services
item.description: Send e-mail services Sometimes you have a form where users can submit contacts and tickets. You want your data to be saved but also send notifications or confirmation e-mails. This is not a simple task to perform. There is a lot of work. A good idea is to use an e-mail third party service. They make money for this service. And is amazing how many people pay for it. Let’s compare some services.
